examples:
QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs > 20 then xs else x:xs)
FROM universities
TO relational

QUERY (\current total -> if length (triplesOf total) < 20 then addTriple total current else total)
FROM famousLocations
TO rdf

QUERY (\x xs -> if length xs > 20 then xs else (escapeTriple x):xs)
FROM famousLocations
TO relational

QUERY (\x xs -> if isInfixOf "Football" (show x) then (escapeTriple x):xs else xs)
FROM famousLocations
TO relational
